episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4001_1001_01:
...And that concludes our tour of Pasio. What do
you think, Chairwoman?
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4001_1001_03:
I’d say it’s an ideal place for sync pairs to hone
their strength, skills, and talent.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4001_1001_05:
With me as their king, my subjects work night and
day to innovate and—
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4001_1001_08: Please excuse me for a moment.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4001_1001_10:
Don’t worry, our agenda will proceed as
planned.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4002_1001_02: What a wonderful display of talent.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/6801_1001_01:
Serious battles that push our talents to greater
heights are exciting to watch.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/6801_1001_02:
Such battles will inspire and guide the sync pairs
of this island!
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/6801_1001_05:
Tyranitar and I are itching for battles against
powerful opponents.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4003_1001_01:
I saw your training just now. You’ve raised your
Pokémon extremely well.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4003_1001_03: Oh, I’m sorry. I haven’t introduced myself, have I?
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4003_1001_04:
I am Geeta, chairwoman of the Paldea region’s
Pokémon League.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4003_1001_05:
I am also the Top Champion, the highest-ranking of
all Champion Rank Trainers.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4003_1001_07:
In the Paldea region, we have more than one
Champion.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4003_1001_08:
Anyone who passes the Champion Assessment
can earn the title of Champion.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4003_1001_09:
But as for the ultimate judgment of who among the
aspiring Champions has what it takes...
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4003_1001_10: That duty falls to me, the Top Champion.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4003_1001_12:
I will also be the judge for the next round of the
upcoming Neo Champion Stadium.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4003_1001_13:
I was surprised to learn of an assessment
challenge so much like the one we hold in Paldea.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4003_1001_14:
It allows young, up-and-coming talent to compete
with each other...
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4003_1001_15:
and in doing so, lead one another to greater
heights. This system for finding Neo Champions
is a marvelous thing, really.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4003_1001_16: Hmph. That has nothing to do with me.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4003_1001_17: Oh, you don’t want to participate? That’s a shame.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4003_1001_18:
Back in Paldea, I met Trainers with rare talent,
just like you.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4003_1001_19:
You have within you a shine that’s similar to what
I saw in those young and talented Trainers.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4003_1001_20: I think you’d do quite well, honestly.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4003_1001_21:
So basically...you want to make me a
Neo Champion?
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4003_1001_22: Well...that, of course, depends on you.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4003_1001_23:
I am utterly incapable of holding back when it
comes to Pokémon battles.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4003_1001_24: It won’t be easy to meet my judging criteria.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4003_1001_26: I don’t care about titles like “Neo Champion”...
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4003_1001_27:
But I’m starting to think I wouldn’t mind taking a
big shot like you down a notch or two.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4003_1001_28: Oh, really? You’re very welcome to try.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4003_1001_31:
I’m the guy who’s going to be the world’s greatest
Pokémon Trainer.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4004_1001_02:
I am hereby informing you all of the next Neo
Champion Stadium!
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4004_1001_03: This time, a new judge will be joining us...
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4004_1001_04: Geeta, the Top Champion of Paldea!
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4004_1001_05: It’s a pleasure to meet you, everyone. I’m Geeta.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4004_1001_06:
I spend my time at the Paldea Pokémon League
seeking out new talent...
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4004_1001_07:
And I am very grateful for this opportunity to
do so here on Pasio, as well.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4004_1001_08:
Now, as you all may already know, the Neo
Champion Stadium is a special competition...
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4004_1001_09:
held to decide who on Pasio can become an
example for everyone to measure up against.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4004_1001_10:
But no matter how blessed you are with talent,
it won’t shine beautifully unless it is polished...
much like a gemstone.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4004_1001_11:
With that in mind, allow me explain the judging
criteria for the next Neo Champion Stadium!
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4005_1001_01:
The rules of this Neo Champion Stadium are quite
simple, really...
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4005_1001_02:
All you have to do is defeat a Champion of your
choice in a one-on-one battle!
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4005_1001_03:
This is a prime opportunity to face off against the
Champions who reign over each Pokémon League
and battle them with everything you’ve got!
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4005_1001_04:
I hope everyone can show off the results of
their day-to-day efforts to hone their skills!
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4005_1001_05:
Of course, you are more than welcome to choose
me as your opponent.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4005_1001_06:
Here on Pasio, our future Champions will blossom
one after another.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4005_1001_07:
I look forward to that from the bottom of my
heart.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4005_1001_08:
If we want battles that’ll fully display the skills of
our challengers...
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4005_1001_09:
that will depend on how much we, the Champions,
can draw those skills out.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4005_1001_10:
So it’s not just the quality of the challengers that’s
being tested here, is it?
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4005_1001_11:
A Champion is someone who guides challengers
with kindness.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4005_1001_12:
Personally, I don’t think there should be a single
shred of doubt in the duty or strength of
a Champion.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4006_1001_02:
You were really focused on the screens just now...
Are you going to give it a go?
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4006_1001_04:
I see! Then you’ll be taking another step towards
achieving your dream!
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4006_1001_05:
But it’s a pretty tall order, asking you to beat a
Champion...
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4006_1001_06:
It sounds like you can choose your opponent...
Who were you thinking of—?
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4006_1001_08:
The person I need to beat is the Champion of the
Indigo Plateau...
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4006_1001_10:
And, well... There may be another person I’ve
got in mind...
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4006_1001_11:
I already know which Pokémon I want to
battle with.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4006_1001_14:
Wait... That Tyranitar hatched from the Egg I gave
you back then?
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4006_1001_15: I see! Wow, it really grew!
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4006_1001_16:
Why are you battling with Tyranitar instead of
one of the Pokémon you usually battle with?
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4006_1001_18:
Because I’ll have the advantage if I use tactics I
haven’t used before on Lance.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4006_1001_19: I’ll beat him this time, for sure!
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4006_1001_20:
Do show us—and all of Pasio—you and Tyranitar
fighting gallantly together!
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4006_1001_21: Yeah, we’ll be watching you until the end.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4006_1001_22: We’ve got high hopes for you.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4006_1001_24: You’ll regret giving me that Pokémon Egg...
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4006_1001_25:
after you see me and Tyranitar shake things up in
the tournament!
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4007_1101_01: On the day of the Neo Champion Stadium...
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4007_1101_02:
The moment of destiny for Silver and Lance finally
arrived...
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4007_1001_03: (Now then, Silver... Let me observe your talent.)
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4007_1001_04: I’ve been waiting so long to battle you like this...
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4007_1001_05: Today’s the day I finally surpass you!
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4007_1001_07: Yeah. He’s got all the strength I need to beat you.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4007_1001_08: You don’t have a clue how we’ll battle, do you?
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4007_1001_09:
(So rather than thinking about his relationship with
his Pokémon, he’s focusing on winning?)
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4007_1001_10:
(I thought that maybe he’d changed since coming
to Pasio, but it seems he still has a ways to go.)
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4007_1101_11: And now, Silver and Champion Lance...
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4007_1001_14:
(He’s avoiding tactics he’s shown me before... That
in itself isn’t a bad idea.)
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4007_1001_16:
I, Lance the dragon master, won’t be taken
down so easily!
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4007_1001_18:
(If his opponent was an average Trainer, the
battle would have been over after that first
attack. But he’s up against the best of the best...)
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4007_1001_19: (Silver...is this as far as your talent will take you?)
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4007_1001_21:
I really thought that you understood what I told
you back in Johto...
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4007_1001_22:
I’m sure there must be Pokémon that you’ve
developed a deep bond with on your journey...
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4007_1001_23: Why aren’t you battling with them?
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4007_1001_24:
If you thought you could beat me just because you
have a powerful new Pokémon, you made a huge
mistake.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4007_1001_26:
You still don’t have enough love and trust in
your Pokémon.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4007_1001_29: Beating you...and becoming the world’s strongest...
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4007_1001_30: is OUR dream! All of ours!
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4009_1001_01:
I knew from the very start that it wouldn’t be easy
to beat you...
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4009_1001_02:
But right now, it’s not just me and Tyranitar
who’re battling!
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4009_1001_04:
(So that Tyranitar is actually battling on behalf
of his other Pokémon...)
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4009_1001_05: Tsk... You’ve been like this ever since we met.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4009_1001_06:
You’re always standing in my way, like a big,
dense wall!
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4009_1001_08: Today’s the day I tear that wall down!
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4009_1001_10: We’ll show you our power...as a sync pair!
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4010_1001_02: Hmph. Kinda late to start getting serious!
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4010_1001_03:
Well, Lance? Hard to tell who’s gonna win
now, huh?
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4010_1001_05: It seems I underestimated you and your Pokémon.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4010_1001_06:
If you’ve truly learned to trust and love your
Pokémon...
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4010_1001_07:
then you’re starting to look like my biggest,
strongest opponent yet!
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4010_1001_08: There’s no need for words now.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4010_1001_09:
We will battle to determine which of us is
stronger.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4010_1001_10:
I, Lance the dragon master, won’t be taken
down so easily!
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4010_1001_11: No way we’re losing—we’re going to surpass you!
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4010_1001_13:
Sorry... I really wanted to bring all of you to the
battle today...
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4010_1001_14: But Tyranitar and I are fighting for you, too!
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4010_1001_22:
After all that, we finally got one win... Give me
a break.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4011_1001_02: He finally made his dream come true!
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4011_1001_03: Yup! But he’s still not done yet!
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4011_1001_05:
Keep on running until you reach the end of all
your dreams, Silver!
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4012_1001_01:
It’s time to announce the results of the Neo
Champion Stadium.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4012_1001_02:
One Trainer who battled against Champion Lance
tenaciously continues to hone himself and his
opponents to shine ever brighter.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4012_1001_03: This is the potential I see in his future.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4012_1001_06:
A Champion is a role model and a source of
inspiration for others aiming for the top.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4012_1001_07: From now on, I want you to guide other Trainers.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4012_1001_08:
This young talent will continue to hone himself
against a multitude of rivals.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4012_1001_09:
May your future shine brightly, Neo Champion
Silver.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4012_1001_10:
Hey—don’t think I’m gonna let you end this
just yet.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4012_1001_11: Now that I’m done with Lance, you’re next, Geeta.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4012_1001_13: My partner’s been nagging me for more battles.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4012_1001_15:
I wouldn’t mind bringing a big shot like you
down a notch or two.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4012_1001_16: Very well. I’ll take you on, then.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4012_1001_18:
As I myself said earlier, I am utterly incapable of
holding back when it comes to Pokémon battles.
episode_event_ch0133_ch0295/4012_1001_20:
Bring it on! The stronger you are, the more fun
we’ll have taking you down!
